# Design Documents

Future design specifications and architectural proposals for SpreadsheetDL.

## Contents

### Security

- [Plugin Signature Verification](plugin-signature-verification.md) - Design for cryptographic plugin verification (Deferred to v0.2.0 (Planned))

## About Design Documents

Design documents in this directory represent future features or architectural changes that are being considered or planned for future releases. These documents:

- Describe the problem being solved
- Outline proposed solutions and trade-offs
- Provide implementation details
- Include status and timeline information
